title: Unfortunately
text: Unfortunately, I cannot wear the pants, they are too tight on my calves, I wear compression socks and they show the imprint of the sock on my legs. I was not thinking and on one of the two pair I ordered, I took the tag off before trying on, now I cannot return the item. They literally were on just long enough to try on and find the issue.

title: Horrible return policy
text: Horrible return policy.  You request a return and instead of just being able to just return items that do not fit, or you do not like, you have to take a picture of each item, submit a request and wait for a response on if your return request is approved.  If you value your time and money do not buy from this site.  Online purchasing is supposed to be easy not a hassle.  Also I am not one to usually complain or submit a bad review, so this says a lot.  Will not buy from this company again simply because of the return policy.

title: Disappointed…presenting in the uk..made…
text: Disappointed…presenting in the uk..made an order  and it’s been a week plus and I haven’t received my order yet..I bought 3 pants…I have been SCAMMED..Customer Service Zero..@ Halara Refund me my moneyHow do you buy something and it takes a week plus to deliver..definitely not having this kind of pressure again

title: Poor customer service
text: I returned an item and got store credit.  With the credit i bought a new item and needed to pay over the credit amount.  When it arrived it was not a good fit - the item did not match the size or description online.  I tried to initiate another return and was only offered store credit again, which would not be enough to cover the cost of a new item and shipping.  After explaining the situation multiple times and how a full refund to my original payment method would be better for me to ensure I come back to the site in the future, I still received the same copy/paste message from support.  I will not be ordering with Halara again.

title: Cst svc issue
text: The shopping was great. The customer service was awful after the fact. It wasn’t even policy etc. it was the simple fact that the agent was acting as if I was be an inconvenience to him asking my questions. Then he was very unprofessional and condescending.

title: This item was not as described the…
text: This item was not as described the fabric was subpar the tummy control wasn’t great. Got fooled by influencers. And then the package took forever to arrive and had a china sticker under the second sticker so I know it just came from a site like Temu or something. I will be sending back.

title: BUYER BEWARE!
text: BUYER BEWARE!! I bought two pairs of pants that were too small in the waist so I wanted to return them. The company did not get back to me in a timely matter. It's now been three days since I initiated the return and they still haven't processed a return label. I was going to order in exchange for a larger size and now I just want my money back!!

title: No Way!!!!
text: The jeans I ordered stated in the advertizement  that the inseam in a regular was 28 inches. When I took them out of the bag my words were " No way". I measured the inseam and it is 30 inches!!! Does not look good with the extra material dragging behind me!!!

title: First off the smell from the pants was…
text: First off the smell from the pants was absolutely horrific!  They also didn’t fit and since it said all sales final I am now stuck with pants that don’t fit and even after two washes, they still smell awful.

title: Mediums are not mediums
text: I normally wear a medium and the shirt I ordered in medium was huge and the leggings I ordered in medium are extremely small. In order to return items you need to submit pictures of their items which is a pain. I would not order from this company again just due to the hassle of returning items.

title: Straight vs Wide
text: The description of the pants that I ordered said straight leg. I had ordered wide leg pants a few weeks ago. When I received this new order, and compared the width of the legs to my earlier purchase, they were the same.I sent an email to them to explain this issue. What I got back was a response saying I’m sorry you weren’t satisfied. Here’s how you can return the item.

title: The clothing is great but the delivery…
text: The clothing is great but the delivery estimate was 10 days and it took a month! Didn’t arrive by the date I had an event planned to wear the clothes. The free gifts are completely cheap rubbish and it would be better to protect the planet not to produce or send them.

title: I am not happy with the quality and I…
text: I am not happy with the quality and I checked the site prior to buying these leggings and they said I had 30 days to return. Now they want photos and in depth explanations as to why I want to return them. 30 day returns is 30 day returns. If they don’t give me back my money I’m contacting the bank.

title: The quality and craftsmanship are poor
text: The quality and craftsmanship are poor. I ordered TALL. I'm 5' 8" and these don't even cover my ankles! I want to return them. After I received them and went to the website, I see that they are not returnable because somehow, this purchase was a "final sale". I feel I've been taken advantage of. I don't want to be forced to purchase items I can't use.

title: I have been trying to return items that…
text: I have been trying to return items that don’t fit since October 29th. I would never order again as a result of costumer service and the inability to return an item that doesn’t fit. After sending the requested information (transaction #, reasons, product #, name and address) I’ve yet to receive a shipping address to return. I think having to take pictures, and pay for the return is also unacceptable. I would never shop online with Halara again nor recommend to a friend.

title: Nothing fit me and I’m trying to return…
text: Nothing fit me and I’m trying to return and  purchase in another size. They want me to download photos of items. I am unable to do that. I’ve been emailing support but not receiving help.

title: The reversal is unnecessarily…
text: The reversal is unnecessarily complicated. Without a photo and reason, a reversal is not possible. According to several critics, the money will not be refunded, so only the gift card option remains. So I got clothes that I don't want. Everything takes time and is anything but user-friendly.

title: They are too short and I’m not tall
text: They are too short and I’m not tall. Material is not too comfortable as I’ve purchased other’s from a different site and they are much better! Beware as you can’t get a return refund without paying more and jumping through hoops! They will give you a gift card but it’s for their company! Not happy at all!!!

title: Would NOT purchase from again!
text: Halara doesnt purchase shipping insurance so if your package comes up missing, the USPS will not reimburse you. I never received my items, and the USPS mistakenly scanned them as delivered (it was a substitute carrier and during the investigation they said they left the package in the cluster box but they cannot leave packages in those boxes because they do not have the keys for them) and neither Halara or the USPS will reimburse me because Halara didnt purchase shipping insurance so the USPS says there is nothing they can do. $96 package gone. I wouldnt of purchased through them if I had known they do not use insurance.

title: Not impressed with this company nor their products
text: Not impressed with the wait time for delivery and the return process just is a hassle with so many steps.  One of the products feels like it was completely misrepresented too--I thought I was getting a nice comfy cozy sweatshirt kind of shirt and it's more like a slinky fabric undershirt.

title: Horrible return policy and process
text: The fact that I had to take pictures of everything I wanted to return is ridiculous….thanks for making me try things on again that didn’t fit or look great on me, not a fun experience. And I have to pay for shipping for returns….another big red flag for me. I was so excited for my purchases, and now am so disappointed with this experience. Will never shop here again, and will advise all friends and family not too either.

title: Bad return or exchange policy
text: The cut and colours are not same as pictured but most importantly is your customer service that push ppl to keep whatever they bought by bad rules of exchange or return. I kept mine but im sure i would never come back to you and tell anyone ask me

title: I ordered 3 pairs of the cargo leggings…
text: I ordered 3 pairs of the cargo leggings and am very disappointed with the quality. The stitching on the pockets on the legs and butt are all coming off. They’re also not the same fabric as the first two pairs I ordered previously and doesn't feel as buttery or as thick. This order makes me not want to order from Halara or recommend to friends anymore.

title: I want a refund but there seems to be…
text: I want a refund but there seems to be no way I can get the process started. I’ve followed instructions but haven’t received any single email so that I can proceed.

title: I ordered a pair of leggings but what I received didn't have any Halara tags
text: I ordered a pair of leggings but the leggings that I received did not have any tags on them. They did not have any tags sewn on the inside or attached to the leggings. They didn't have anything on them to show they were Halara so I don't believe what I received was Halara. They were packaged in a bag that said Halara but that was it.

title: First off shipping took long and second…
text: First off shipping took long and second of all I hated that the leggings rolled down from the waist and just for reference I’m a size 4 and a small in stretchy clothes and I have a flat belly so there was no reason for that issue

title: Return process is complex
text: Return process is way too complex with specific criteria for returning. I had to submit a ticket wait for approval to return items. Then received a long email with options.   The optional ups qr code did not work. Now trying the usps next. I hope it works!

title: I never got my order
text: I never got my order. I’ve ordered numerous amount of times in the past and never had an issue. They showed my package and where my order was sent to but it was the wrong address despite my correct address being written on the order form. I sent them pictures and even went to the incorrect address to get my order. I wish I could speak to someone but there’s only emails. I’m so disappointed I lost my money and all I wanted was my order. I will never order from them again.

title: Impossible to return
text: Impossible to return. They do not provide a shipping address or a shipping method for returns. Costumer suport simply said that I need to figure it out on my own. Fit of clothes is weird. Even though I ordered petite pants the inseam is way too long to fit on a shorter person.

title: It said delivered but I never received…
text: It said delivered but I never received my package. If your company could contact me I’d appreciate it. 386-585-0148

title: These jeans smell like chemicals
text: These jeans smell like chemicals.  I have them hanging outside to see if they air out, if not they should be disposed of in a hazardous waste landfill.

title: The wrong items were sent
text: The wrong items were sent. It's not what I ordered. Pretty standard for cheap shit sent from overseas. No way to contact or rectify reliably. Fighting it with my credit card. I'll never order again.

title: The pants were nothing like they were…
text: The pants were nothing like they were supposed to be, but you guys don’t allow returns and refund so now I’m stuck with them so it was just a waste of money. I will never order from you guys again.

title: Beware of fake reviews
text: Beware of fake reviews. Ordered 6th October and still not arrived 2nd November! Tracking not provided, some nonsense about pre order and every day when I check, date that parcel has gone through customs keeps changing to the current day!

title: Strong chemical odour
text: The jeans themselves are great. But they smell so badly like mothballs / chemicals that it is impossible to wear them. Really disappointing.

title: Weird fit
text: The sizes may be about right, but the git just doesn’t work - I’ve never met a person with a back long enough for these trousers. Me (169cm) and my daughter (173cm)  oth tried these on, and the waistline of all 5 different pants went 6-10 cm above waistline, and the bra band 10cm below the normal place. Returning every single thing.And it would also be nice to be able to opt out the gifts - the planet needs no more crap.

title: Very difficult to do returns
text: Very difficult to do returns.  This is the second time this has happened to me.  You need to email Halara, then they send you a link to a return form and label.  Neither one would download, finally the label did.  All being done thru email.  Very frustrating.  I like their clothes but dread a return.

title: Size guide provided is inaccurate.
text: I ordered the jeans using my measurements with the size guide provided online. They are a full size too big around the waist and down past my feet. Went to look up the return policy online and all sales are final. Buyer beware.

title: It took so long to arrive and they…
text: It took so long to arrive and they would not give me a refund. I am returning them because the material is not as described.

title: Your company refused to accept a return…

If customer service winds up helping me, I will gladly erase this review, but for now, I am very displeased with this process.

title: Never received package, even said it’s been delivered

No idea where as no on the photo door number and whoever ( looks like man ) holding my package I can’t recognise ( no face on the photo). Checked all neighbourhood doors that like that and no one received anything.

title: These are the worst leggings I’ve ever…

Not flattering at all, and I am a very fit person. Made me look fat and I am a 00. I purchased 3 pairs, super disappointed.

title: Refused 2nd pair on BOGOF deal
text: Halara advertised a buy one get one free offer on their leggings.  As a regular buyer of leggings I had seen the adverts several times and was excited to be buying my first pair.  A week later only one pair arrived.  I messaged Halara and they explained that to receive their BOGOF offer then 2 pairs needed to be added to the basket.  I saw on their reviews this had happened multiple times to other customers.  Whilst this wasn't clear on their website I would have been happy if they then sent out the second pair and apologised.  But no, three messages later (via email and then facebook) and they're still refusing to send out a second pair.  Terrible customer service and now making me quite angry.  Something that could have been easily rectified but felt like they were trying it on, especially seeing this has happened to multiple customers.

title: Not all they’re cracked up to be
text: The jeans felt good initially when I put them on, but as I wore them throughout the day they stretched out a ton and continued to fall down at the waist, leaving me constantly pulling them up. The waistband also rolls down onto itself when I sit. Wanted to love them but will not wear these pants ever again.

title: The material is cheap
text: The material is cheap, thin and uncomfortable. Not nearly worth the money. Also the "flare" is almost a boot cut straight leg. Would not buy from this company again.

title: Random and incorrect sizes.
text: I ordered 4 pairs of trousers in the same size.The products were ok, but 2 of them are massively smaller than the others and quite clearly not true to size by some distance.Now I am in a battle to try and send them back which is becoming very stressful.I really wish I had not wasted my money and so will try and claim through PayPal.I would say unless you know your exact size I wouldn't touch these,  but them again, the sizing varies so much that you are not guaranteed to get the correctly sized items anyway!!!

title: This is an awful company
text: This is an awful company. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY, THESE PEOPLE ARE SCAMMERS! I placed an order at 2:01 pm. It said on my email that it takes 8-10 business days to ship. After reading the awful reviews stating how cheap and bad the clothing material is, I sent an email at 2:26pm... So literally 25 minutes later stating that I wanted to cancel my order and be refunded. They purposely shipped my order out THE NEXT MORNING (even though the confirmation email said that the items would take 8-10 business days to ship) and then sent an email DIRECTLY AFTER THE SHIPPING NOTIFICATION that they had already shipped my order and it was too late to be refunded. I HAVE NEVER BEEN SCAMMED MORE IN MY LIFE. NEVER SPEND MONEY WITH THIS COMPANY. THEY HAVE NO INTEGRITY AND ARE SNAKES. title: Terrible customer service and Return Policy
text: I have placed an order for a pair of trousers with this company. As soon as I payed, I realised that I have ordered a wrong fit. I immediately emailed the contact address as well as messaged live chat to request amended to my order and change the fit type. Within 2 hours, I received numerous emails from the company from different people with different information. One of the emails however has suggested that amendment has been made. Upon arrival, I received an initially ordered incorrect fit type and was extremely disappointed. I cannot understand how in such short period of time they did not managed to amend my order, even though they said they did. I contacted customer service again to notify that I received not amended order and was told that they weren’t unable to amend it (?). Even though they said they will as soon as I emailed them first time. Now, to receive a correct fit I need to return these trousers, however, buyer pays for postage. This postage will cost me almost as much as trousers did. Trousers are actually nice quality on feel but customer service and return policy is terrible. Won’t buy again.

title: Misrepresentation...
text: I was charged $19.90 for shipping to have my order delivered within 3 to 5 days as this 2nd order was a birthday gift to my wife...I had already just spent $135.46 purchasing 3 items from you (1st order) and had now spent $175.02 purchasing 6 items from you (2nd order) ...but my 2nd order wasn't even shipped until 16 days AFTER I had placed the order...apparently one item placed this entire order on hold...had I been informed by you of the unavailability of that item I would have structured my purchase accordingly...and no one has apologized...you've responded with boiler plate replies intimating as though I am at fault here...how unfortunate for you...my wife is extremely satisfied with your products...all of them...as am I, but because of this misrepresentation and nonchalant attitude I've received from you in regard to this matter I am likely never to conduct business with your company again.Respectfully, Joseph David Brackett

As well as the unnecessary expense and a lot of saying how returns seem to get lost,  the carbon footprint involved in this is also unnecessary. A ridiculous way to deal with the situation that has only resulted in a bad review and a lost customer. I was unable to speak to anyone in management when I asked for this to be escalated in the hopes someone with some common sense might step in. Feels like this was deliberately made difficult in the hopes I won’t bother.

title: So Dissapointed!
text: I was really looking forward to Halara. They have a lot of cute items for reasonable priced. Unfortunately, I ordered some items that did not fit (I should have looked at the sizing charts a little closer, but that's my fault) and had to make a return. Halara does not do exchanges, which I would have loved, but the more annoying part is how agonizing it is to do a return through them. It's a multi-step process that involved submitting pictured of what you want to return (never seen that before, other than for damaged items) and then they make it very challenging to get a true refund. I was not interested in a gift card. Not only do they bury the option for a true refund, they make it near impossible to figure out where to ship your returns (spoiler alert: it's not the return address on your shipping label--they make that very clear). I'm still searching for the return address, so who knows if I'll ever get my refund.

title: Difficult Refund Process & Understaffed Support Team
text: This review is for the High Waisted Work Pants, size 2X in gray and black AND my experience with Halara Support. I'm 5'2" and bought these pants for a new job. I typically wear a 1X or 2X and used the Halara Size Guide to select the 2X size. Despite being $40 each, the pants I received were made of an extremely cheap polyester and would need to be hemmed at least four inches in order to fit me. After finding it impossible to initiate a return on the Halara website, I emailed support on 10/9/24. In response to my email, I was sent an unresponsive link to initiate a return. I then spent 25 minutes in Chat Support with a clearly overwhelmed team member who was able to eventually email me a return label despite her saying it would originally take her 24 hours to do so. On 10/11/24, I spent $4 on packaging and mailed the pants back to Halara via UPS. On the 17th, Halara Support emailed me and stated they needed a tracking number before initiating a return. I attached my UPS receipt and on the 18th they stated they initiated a refund of $89.90 to my card. It is now 10/22/24. The refund that is still processing to my account is only for $82 despite Halara support stating that the refund would include the cost of the shipping label. This also doesn't account for the $4 I spent on packaging. In total, I've wasted over $93, 25 minutes over chat, and hours on emails to wait 9 business days to MAYBE receive a partial refund. I do not recommend that you purchase anything from Halara.

title: They do not post negative reviews
text: I’ve purchased 3 completely different items from Halara and they were all terrible in one way or another.  The best were a pair of their leggings, in that the style was nice and they fit well, but they started to pill between the legs after the first wear.  The other two were dress pants and I’ve never paid so much for such terrible products in my entire life.  They do not match their description in any way and they expect you to pay the  shipping fees to return them.  And include tracking as you must send them the number.  What are described as professional work dress pants were misshapen yoga pants.  I chose to not pay the return shipping and instead write an honest review of each item, with photos, but they will not post them.  I would guess the positive reviews are all fake because the reviews on the items I purchased do not match my experience at all.  To the point that I thought they sent me the wrong items because I couldn’t believe they could be so different.  I’m down considerable money and have two pairs of unwearable pants and a pair of leggings that are going to wear out.  Also would like to add that the shipping took a very long time and came from China.  At one point the tracking stopped, which usually means you can then track it via Canada post, but the number shows as invalid.  When the package arrived it had a whole new label put over top of the original shipping label and had a completely different tracking number.  Very sketchy practice for what is supposed to be a reputable business.  Also, they spam you with texts and emails numerous times a day, even if you’ve just looked at an item it will send a message saying they noticed you looking at this item, which I found really creepy.  My junk messages multiplied overnight from my first interaction with this website.  I promise I’m not a negative person.   I almost never write a negative review, I’m just so shocked.

title: Unprofessional return experience
text: Halara has lost a customer due to a completely unprofessional return experience. I've purchased clothes from Halara a few times. The fit has been slightly off for me in many cases but nothing too major that had me write them off entirely. They have some cute pieces.But I recently purchased a dress (9/1) that, again the fit was slightly off (straps would not lay flat) and I knew I wasn't going to wear it. I received it 9/9, and started a return on 9/21 - well within 30 days of the delivery date. They said including pictures in the return request would expedite the process so I did. I was surprised to learn the request had to be "reviewed" before I could even get a return label, but fine.By 10/7, there had been no updates on my request and *I* had to reach out to *them* saying, if 30 days lapses bc of delays on Halara's end then they can't hold that against me, and also please look at my request. They did and it was approved and they said I would get an email within 24 hours with detailed return instructions.24 hours pass, I get no email. On 10/9, I had to chase them *again* to get my return label. I finally did get the return label and sent it out.All I can say is, the 2+ week delay alongside *me* having to chase *them* TWICE felt not only unprofessional but almost like they were just hoping I would forget about the request so they could keep their money. Completely ridiculous and not worth purchasing another item at the risk of having to go through this return experience again.

title: Buy only if you have the spirit to fight a returns battle
text: All well and good if you don’t mind cheap looking clothes that are smaller than the advertised sizes. I have bought better quality items, with comparable fabrics, from Amazon UK with next day delivery and free returns at much cheaper prices. I was extremely disappointed by the reality vs advertised expectations. Meanwhile these take several weeks to ship from (I guess) China and the returns are not free and easy like I was led to believe by their advertising. The returns process is costly, complicated and difficult. You are compelled to provide photographic proof of return reason, and explain, and then fight over and over with their customer chat to extract information on WHERE to return. You have to await authorisation to return from them before that as well!! Thankfully there’s a UK returns address near Heathrow. You then have to send them proof of return and your tracking number. Then it’s a case of chasing every day by repeating the same questions on their customer chat until you force them to refund you. I was assured that my refund had been authorised, only to see an email the next morning inviting me to return my items or take a credit voucher. And that was nearly a week after Evri tracking confirmed the item had been received by them from me, with signature. Seriously, do not buy unless you think you really want some item. And only if you like mediocre quality polyester clothing with an obvious logo placement. I will be deleting the app and asking my social media algorithm bots to hide ads from this company.

title: BE AWARE! RETURNS ARE NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE!
text: As a first time customer I was super excited to try these high praise dresses. They look super cute, comfy, and practical. Which they ended being so no complains there, they did live up to their quality standards. However, I accidentally ordered the same dress twice, not noticing the quantity was '2' when the order processed. As soon as I noticed I emailed them right away to help me correct the order to only '1' because it was a duplicate. There were two other dresses so it wasn't just the only one, How hard was it to just correct my quantity but they said No and to just wait until I receive it to return it. They also told me I had to pay to ship it back. Like WTH, okay, fine...whatever, that was partly my fault. Now that it is time to attempt a RETURN. Oh man, do they make that hard to do. You have to take pictures, fill out these form, print all this stuff...I did all that-- sent BOTH dresses back although they messed up on their return form that it was only for ONE dress. I told them 2 dresses are going to be return and on the return form I crosses out '1' and wrote '2'.They got the return package and only refunded ONE dress. They claimed that they only receive ONE dress when I sent both back. text: This was my second purchase from Halara this year. The items did not fit and I initiated a return. First I tried the website but ended up using the app because the instructions stated that including a picture would hasten the return. I followed the directions closely. The return process is clunky, not intuitive, and the app provides no direction. Regardless, I completed the return process over a week ago and have received no instruction on the next steps for my return. No label, and no address, confirmation or tracking number. At the same time, I’ve received daily multiple marketing emails from Halara. I do not recommend buying anything from this company based on this experience. My return window will soon expire and I will have wasted my money. Halara should improve this process. I will never again purchase anything from them based on this experience.

That was NOT shown in the photos and isn't on any of my previous hauls.  I'm very, very disappointed with the new logo.  I'm actually much more upset about the logo than even receiving a damaged item.  The logo makes it look like you're wearing your gym clothes and looks super tacky! I used to love wearing Halara stuff out clubbing or date nights, I've worn Halara to weddings, but that's just not going to happen now with this bright reflective stamp on it.  Because of the new logos, I will no longer be a regular customer.   I will try to buy second hand to find old Halara before they ruined everything with the tacky logo stamp.  Halara is very recognizable and doesn't need to lower itself with tacky logos, I've had other women say "ooo that's a Halara piece! I love it them!" And I've said the same to other ladies I've met out and about when I recognize a Halara  fan.

title: Difficult Return Process
text: I'm giving a 1 star review based on the return process for this company. The return process is tedious and confusing and it seems to be that way in order to discourage people from returning items. You must first "request" to return an item which then leads to a 24 hour wait time to be granted. Then you receive an email asking how you would like to return your items, that then needs a 24 hour timeline to process. After 48+ (it was longer for me) hours and two interactions, a third email comes when you can request a shipping label to return your items. Ease of return brings me back to purchase more from a company. This company does not provide that therefore I will not be shopping from them again. It should not take a multistep process over the span of 3 days to return an item.

Dear Valued Customer, We always keep price point in mind, only make what we can sell to offer quality products that are accessible to our customers. Unfortunately, at this moment, we're not able to afford the return fee. Sorry to hear about your experience regarding the return issue, we're actively working on elevating the return experience. Our team contacted you on September 15 and September 16, but did not receive your response. Please check your inbox or spam.Update: I see. It’s just inconvenient and a waste of money if you’re unsure of your size and you buy multiple items of things to what your size is then have to pay the shipping send them all back. title: Beware of Return Policy
text: I placed an order on 08/01/24 for three of the Backless Twisted Easy Peezy dresses in a size Small.  It was about a 3/4 week turn around time to receive them which I had no problems with.  Once I received my items I immediately tried them on and decided I did not like the fit in the size small so I decided to return  them but in the mean time I went and placed an order for the same 3 dresses in a size medium since it took so long to get the first 3 dresses.  I put in a request for a return on 08/28 and had to wait for an approval email telling me what my options were. I got the email and was told I could either get a gift card for the total of my order or send my items back for a refund.  I opted for the refund b/c I had already placed a reorder for the bigger size so I didn't see a need for a gift card b/c I had no intention of buying anything else from this company.  I had to wait to get an email again from Halara for the return instructions and the steps I needed to follow.  I received that email on 8/28/24 as well that stated I needed to send in the return form and I could use the return label that they sent me but they would take $9.90 off of my refund.  Again I had no issues with any of this.  I packed my items up and sealed them into the bag that they came in and printed my label and dropped my package off to the post office on 8/29/24.  My package got picked up on 08/30/24 at 2:09 pm.  According to tracking my package arrived at Aurora Il on 09/03/24 and was out for delivery at 6:10 am.  It has been available for pickup since 09/03/24  at the post office at 525 N Broadway in Aurora IL.  All of this can be verified through the tracking number of 9202290182632204498054 which is on the label that Halara provided to me.  I can't get a refund until someone goes and picks up the package. The USPS tracking says that  a redelivery has to be arranged but the USPS website won't allow me to schedule one.  When I reached out to support on 09/14, they responded back and stated : "Once we receive your return, we'll process your refund within 3-5 days. title: Never received anything
text: Halara was having a sale, so I purchased quite a few items. It said it was shipping from China, and I waited for 4.5 weeks until the tracking said delivered. I checked my apartment, my mailroom, my neighbors and nothing. In the meantime, the tracking information had disappeared as if it never existed (everything said error and wouldn't pull up the order number/tracking number, etc). Customer service responded right away and said sometimes this happens as it's international. They said they'd send out a second shipment. This time the tracking was through a different company. Again, almost 5 weeks went by and the tracking said it was delivered. Again, nothing. I have never, in my 3 years of living here, had an issue with packages. They go to the mailroom. Neighbors are all in communication. The package never arrived. At this point, I contact customer service and they say "due to their loss", they can offer me a 70% refund. I just want SOMETHING for the money I paid, so I agree to the partial refund. It has now been 4 months in total. I reached out to ask when the refund would hit my account and they said it "takes time". They literally stole my money.
